snippet: Three big private equity firms are providing loans to investor-landlords. | Citigroup is selling its subprime consumer loan unit. | Private equity payouts leave the rest of Wall Street in the dust. | Profit at Standard Chartered slides

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Equity Firms Push Into Landlord Loans
